Description: This large-scale, super soft seating experience is designed to take family room time to a whole new level. Choose from six different style options, all with the sink-in luxury of our Ultra Down cushion.

Descriptions: Standard: Loose Pillow Back / 19" Throw Pillows.
Number of standard throw pillows represented in illustration.
41" depth standard. To order 45" depth, add LUXE to product number. Example: 2300-20 CHILL LUXE. Extra charge applies for LUXE depth.

Width measurements based on widest arm styles, the CHILL, URBANE & VINTAGE. Overall width is reduced with these arm options: ENDURE -3.5" per arm, MOD -2.25" per arm, PURE -2.75" per arm. Seating area dimensions not affected by arm choice.

Description: Bring soft, casual comfort to the small-scale family room. This design features a simplistic track arm for a modern look. It comes standard with our High Resiliency cushion for supportive comfort and crisp tailoring. Also available with bench cushion and in slipcover.

Descriptions: Standard: Loose Pillow Back
Throw pillows are NOT standard on this collection.
The 2600 collection is available with a bench cushion. To order, use style number 2601 instead of 2600. Example: 2601-20/84 TRACK
The 2600 and 2601 styles are available as a slipcover. To order, add prefix “S” to style number. Example: S2600-20/84 TRACK or S2601-20/84 TRACK
Premium Plush cushion is available as an upgrade to 2600, 2601, S2600 and S2601.

Description: This is your official invitation to unwind, relax and make cherished memories. For those who appreciate the fusion of classic and contemporary aesthetics, the Track arm T-cushion style effortlessly combines the best of both worlds. With two depth options, whether you prefer sinking into deep, plush cushions or require a more upright and supportive seating experience, this collection has you covered.

38" depth standard. 41" available. To order 41" depth, add "LUXE" to style number. Example: 7294-20 TRACK LUXE. Extra charge applies for LUXE depth.

Description: With deep seated comfort and modern upscale styling, this collection is versatile enough to create a wow factor in a variety of homes, from city loft to modern mountain to rustic lakefront. Available in multiple sofa lengths and sectional configurations.

Descriptions: Standard: Loose Pillow Back

The 7296 can be ordered with or without throw pillows. To order without throw pillows use 7296 as the style number. To add throw pillows, add “P” to the style number. Example: 7296P-20/96. Please see 7296P items in the price list for details. Adding “P” to the style number adds (1) 19” square pillow and (1) 15” rectangular kidney pillow per arm.
